rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 23 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:37 PM, 21 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Rizal and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Metro Manila(Quezon City, Manila, Caloocan, Valenzuela, Malabon, Navotas, Muntinlupa, Marikina, Mandaluyong, San Juan), Cavite(Ternate, Naic, Tanza, Maragondon, Rosario, Noveleta, General Trias, Cavite City, Kawit, Dasmarinas, Bacoor, Imus), Bulacan(Obando, Meycauayan, Marilao, Bulakan, Santa Maria, Bocaue, San Miguel, San Ildefonso), Nueva Ecija(Cabanatuan, Santa Rosa, San Antonio, Talavera, Santo Domingo, Aliaga, Quezon), Tarlac(Concepcion), Zambales(San Felipe, San Narciso, Cabangan, Botolan, San Marcelino, Candelaria), Pampanga(Candaba, Magalang, Arayat), Quezon(Mauban) and Batangas(Tuy) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
